edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule

Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule.Schedule

  • public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a student's schedule. Stores an ArrayList of Course objects and a title for its state
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste, Kevin Hildner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Schedule()
      Constructs the Schedule; initializes an empty array list for the schedule field and the Schedule's title to a default value

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCourseToSchedule(Course c)
      Adds a specified course to the end of the schedule
      boolean canAdd(Course c)
      Checks if a course can be added to the schedule.
      int getScheduleCredits()
      Gets the cumulative sum of the credit values for all courses in the schedule.
      java.lang.String[][] getScheduledCourses()
      Returns a 2D array of course info where each row is a different course and the columns are name, section, title and meeting string
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Gets the Schedule's title
      boolean removeCourseFromSchedule(Course c)
      Removes a specified course from the schedule
      void resetSchedule()
      Creates a new empty schedule ArrayList and resets the title to the default value

      Sets the Schedule's title

    • Constructor Detail

      • Schedule

        public Schedule()
        Constructs the Schedule; initializes an empty array list for the schedule field and the Schedule's title to a default value

    • Method Detail

      • addCourseToSchedule

        public boolean addCourseToSchedule(Course c)
        Adds a specified course to the end of the schedule
        Parameters:
        c - the course to be added
        Returns:
        true if the course was added successfully
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a duplicate course is passed or if the passed course conflicts with any others already in the schedule

      • removeCourseFromSchedule

        public boolean removeCourseFromSchedule(Course c)
        Removes a specified course from the schedule
        Parameters:
        c - the course to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the course was removed, false if the course does not exist in the schedule

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule()
        Creates a new empty schedule ArrayList and resets the title to the default value

      • getScheduledCourses

        public java.lang.String[][] getScheduledCourses()
        Returns a 2D array of course info where each row is a different course and the columns are name, section, title and meeting string
        Returns:
        the schedule's course information as a 2D array

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Gets the Schedule's title
        Returns:
        the title

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the Schedule's title
        Parameters:
        title - the title to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the title is null

      • getScheduleCredits

        public int getScheduleCredits()
        Gets the cumulative sum of the credit values for all courses in the schedule.
        Returns:
        the sum of the credit load of courses in schedule

      • canAdd

        public boolean canAdd(Course c)
        Checks if a course can be added to the schedule.
        Parameters:
        c - the course to be added
        Returns:
        false if the course is null, the course is already in the schedule, or there is a conflict, true otherwise.
